Title: Chased by the Dogs
Writer: Kamal El-Shaikh, Sabry Ezzat, Najeeb Mahfouz (novel)
Actors: Shukry Sarhan, Shadyah, Kamal Al-Shennawi, Samir Sabri
Plot: After four years in prison, the young thief Said Mahran come out of jail & seek revenge against those who betrayed him,his beloved wife and his trusted henchman, who conspired to turn him into the police,they are now married to each other and are keeping his six-year-old daughter from him and his mentor Rauf Ilwan.The original title in Arabic mean "the thief & the dogs" this movie was Adapted from a famous novella by Naguib Mahfouz how also co-wrote the film screenplay.Mahfouz was inspired by the life of the famous Egyptian thief Mahmoud Amin Soliman.
